Our Innitiatives

We are deeply committed to addressing local and global concerns with innovative solutions in order to uplift communities, improve lives, and optimize businesses.
Our goal is to create a better world in which the transformative potential of technology is harnessed through innovative solutions that are accessible to everybody.
Our unwavering dedication is based on ensuring that our technical advances assist people all across the world.

Kadodo Africa

BUSINESS DIRECTORY & PROFILING

Kadodo Africa is a business, industrial, and trade online resource dedicated to connecting businesses of all sorts, particularly SMEs, with consumers who are actively seeking online for their products and services. The platform functions as a business directory, marketing site, product display portal, and job advertising and recruitment site. It positions firms to be competitive in their respective industries. Kadodo was designed to identify, verify, and authenticate firms in Africa, beginning with Ghana, so that they can take benefit of the Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement (ACFTA).

eDuBoost

Social Impact Project

eDuBoost is a social impact initiative focused on integrating information and technology (IT) into education in Ghana. Through teacher and student training, it aims to enhance learning using technology. The project provides schools with affordable, advanced tech solutions through shared-cost methods and collaborations with tech partners. This includes ICT training facilities, administration systems, personalized websites, e-learning tools, and ongoing support. eDuBoost also conducts refresher courses for teachers, IT training for administrators, and system maintenance to ensure effective implementation.

Sukupay

Payment Solution

Sukupay is a third-party mobile, online payment solution and transactional system that also supports offline digital payment via QR codes. Sukupay is made up of two parts: the payment solution and the e-commerce platform, which allows merchants and individuals to conduct seamless transactions at a relatively low cost.

SukuFarms

INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY IN AGRICULTURE

SUKU Technologies created SukuFarms as a social enterprise that exists to eradicate poverty by enriching and deepening the inclusion of Information technology in the agricultural value chain using an application; mobile phone and web based; known as SukuFarms developed to work with individual farmers or cooperations with multiple farmers. It enables small holder farmers to move from traditional farming to market-oriented farming by accessing modern best practices, real time information on weather patterns and policies that are likely to affect their farm yields and easy access to market places thus easing value chain transactions.

Global technology solutions and consulting helping clients meet business goals through expertise in platforms and technical solutions.
